CustomField.formula: (grax__Records_To_Process__c = 0 || grax__Records_To_Process__c = null) && ( grax__GRAX_Schedule_Process__c = null && grax__Execution_Unique_Key__c = null && grax__of_Times_Sent__c >= 24 || grax__GRAX_Schedule_Process__c = null && grax__Execution_Unique_Key__c != null || ( ( NOT(grax__GRAX_Schedule_Process__r.grax__Is_Running__c) && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) < TODAY() - 15 ) || ( grax__GRAX_Schedule_Process__r.grax__Execution_Unique_Key_Helper__c != grax__Execution_Unique_Key__c && NOT(grax__GRAX_Schedule_Process__r.grax__Is_Running__c) ) || ( (grax__Num_Records_Failed_To_Delete__c = 0 || ISBLANK(grax__Num_Records_Failed_To_Delete__c)) && grax__GRAX_Schedule_Process__r.grax__Can_Delete_GRAX_Records__c && ( ISPICKVAL(grax__Status__c, 'Sent Successful') || ( ISPICKVAL(grax__Status__c, 'Not Sent') && NOT(grax__GRAX_Schedule_Process__r.grax__Is_Running__c) ) ) && ( ISBLANK(grax__GRAX_Archive_Process__c) || grax__GRAX_Archive_Process__r.grax__Can_Delete_GRAX_Record__c ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Can Delete GRAX Record?
